## Problem 1

```{r}
p1_df = tibble(
  vec_numeric = runif(10, 0, 5),
  vec_logical = vec_numeric > 2,
  vec_char = letters[1:10],
  vec_factor = factor(rep(c('fac1', 'fac2'), 5))
)
mean(p1_df$vec_numeric)
mean(p1_df$vec_logical)
mean(p1_df$vec_char)
mean(p1_df$vec_factor)
```
